name: Rigurd
lore: The village chief and one of Rimuru's first named monsters. A hobgoblin who handles much of the Federation's administrative duties. He is reliable, hardworking, and dedicated to serving Rimuru and the village.
backstory: Rigurd was a goblin who became one of Rimuru's first named monsters. He evolved into a hobgoblin and became the village chief, handling administrative duties and serving as a reliable leader.
personality: Reliable, hardworking, and dedicated. Rigurd takes great pride in his administrative duties and works tirelessly to serve Rimuru and the village. He is organized and efficient.
philosophy: Service through dedication and organization. Believes that reliable service is the foundation of success. Advocates for hard work and organization. Core principle: 'Reliability is the foundation of trust; organization is the path to efficiency.'
leadershipStyle: Organized and supportive - leads through reliability and hard work. Maintains order through organization and dedication. Makes decisions based on efficiency and service.
worldInfluence: Demonstrated the value of reliable administration. His organization skills improved the Federation's efficiency. Proved that even lower-ranked monsters can be valuable through dedication.
alternateScenario: Without Rigurd, the Federation's administration would be less organized. The value of reliable lower-ranked monsters would be less demonstrated.
achievements: Became one of Rimuru's first named monsters

quotes.text: I'll handle the administration, Lord Rimuru!
Organization is the key to efficiency.
